channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Brad Dalton
item.dc:creator: Brad Dalton
item.description: Susan is patient and has a clear understanding of the web design & theme customisation process so she's also easy to work with.
item.content:encoded: Susan is patient and has a clear understanding of the web design & theme customisation process so she’s also easy to work with.

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: Susan is a great lady! Always patient and helpful. She's clear with her instructions and if you still can't figure out something, she keeps on helping. I'm so glad I met her through "Pretty Darn Cute".
item.content:encoded: Susan is a great lady! Always patient and helpful. She’s clear with her instructions and if you still can’t figure out something, she keeps on helping. I’m so glad I met her through “Pretty Darn Cute”.

item.title: By: Marjorie Ray
item.dc:creator: Marjorie Ray
item.description: Great interview! It was wonderful to learn more about you Susan, thanks Nick for these "get to know" the community member talks. Susan, I still remember you helping me in the Genesis facebook group when I was first starting with Genesis a few years back. I was so grateful for the support. I think we are both onboard for the upcoming Genesis Camp and I look forward to working with you on that again this year. Thanks for sharing the background of Elise, so sorry for your loss. Knowing that is in your life experience, but that you chose to name your business One Happy Studio is doubly inspiring. All the best, Marjorie
item.content:encoded: Great interview! It was wonderful to learn more about you Susan, thanks Nick for these “get to know” the community member talks. Susan, I still remember you helping me in the Genesis facebook group when I was first starting with Genesis a few years back. I was so grateful for the support. I think we are both onboard for the upcoming Genesis Camp and I look forward to working with you on that again this year. Thanks for sharing the background of Elise, so sorry for your loss. Knowing that is in your life experience, but that you chose to name your business One Happy Studio is doubly inspiring. All the best, Marjorie

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/meet-susan-ramsey/#comment-268">Susan</a>.
Thanks Susan, it's an honour to have you on here!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Susan.

Thanks Susan, it’s an honour to have you on here!

item.title: By: Susan
item.dc:creator: Susan
item.description:
Thank you so much, Nick, for inviting me to participate - the questions were great (and challenging!) to answer.
I hope 2016 is a successful year for each of us!
item.content:encoded:
Thank you so much, Nick, for inviting me to participate – the questions were great (and challenging!) to answer.

I hope 2016 is a successful year for each of us!
